DESCRIPTION:
Aliens: Colonial Marines - New game from Gearbox, the walls of which were born hits Borderlands and Brothers in Arms. This first-person shooter will take you into a world famous in the epic "Aliens." There, where fear holds down the most courageous fighters, and around every corner lurks danger of death. You and your friends will become the best soldiers in the galaxy - the colonial marines United States. You need to not just survive: your task - to avert the terrible alien threat to humanity!

FEATURES:
Ã¢â€“Âª Fight with alien creatures, using the whole range of colonial marines from the cult film James Cameron's "Aliens" - pulse rifles, motion detectors and flame-throwers.
Ã¢â€“Âª You will visit the famous ship Ã‚Â«SulacoÃ‚Â» and stroll through the cramped corridors of the colony Ã‚Â«Hadley HopeÃ‚Â» on the planet LV-426. There you will have the full feel the spirit of dark and dangerous world where your life could end at any moment.
Ã¢â€“Âª Developers from Gearbox knows how to make an interesting co-op mode, and Aliens: Colonial Marines is reflected all their experience. You can always ask for help from other players. Complete the campaign scene side by side with your friends in the squad of up to four fighters, each of which can be connected to the overall game and leave it at will.
Ã¢â€“Âª To deal with the alien threat, you have to become a ruthless and deadly machine, relentlessly destroying strangers. The extensive system of improvements in Aliens: Colonial Marines will develop a character exactly as the favorite style of play. Earn experience points to gain new abilities, weapons and equipment for the soldiers of his unit.
